FuncDef: The display mac-address tunnel command displays the number of MAC address entries. The display mac-address tunnel command displays the number of MAC address entries. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of MAC address entries.
-

Number of Layer 2 tunnel MAC address entries.
-

Displays statistics about MAC address entries in a specified slot.
The value is an integer. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.
